tool_description:
Instant PAN Card Verification using government database check. 

IDfy’s PAN Card Verification API instantly verifies details of a PAN Card by confirming them from the Government database.  

This makes your onboarding process faster, safer and smarter. With IDfy’s PAN verification, you can be confident that the individuals or merchants you onboard hold a valid PAN card and have provided you with the right identity proof.
name: PAN Card Verification
title: PAN Card Verification

api_list.name: PAN Card Verification
api_list.description:
nstant PAN Card Verification using government database check. 

IDfy’s PAN Card Verification API instantly verifies details of a PAN Card by confirming them from the Government database.  

This makes your onboarding process faster, safer and smarter. With IDfy’s PAN verification, you can be confident that the individuals or merchants you onboard hold a valid PAN card and have provided you with the right identity proof.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://pan-card-verification1.p.rapidapi.com/v3/tasks/sync/verify_with_source/ind_pan"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "pan-card-verification1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

import requests

url = "https://pan-card-verification1.p.rapidapi.com/v3/tasks/sync/verify_with_source/ind_pan"
